main.name: Nick Reese
main.description: I am a musician currently enrolled in the Full Stack Web Development boot camp at Case Western Reserve University, powered by Trilogy
main.bio: I am comfortable using Node, Express, JavaScript, API's, AJAX, HTML, CSS, React, Mongo, MySQL, PWA's and Handlebars. In my free time I enjoy writing and performing music live, both solo and with a band. I like to go kayaking, hiking and also enjoy shooting photos with my Polaroid. I am also a dog dad to a cockapoo named Lamb.
main.contactmessage: Please contact me via email or phone.

resume.skillmessage: Junior Full Stack Web Developer looking to grow and expand my coding skills

education.description: Started in nursing and then switched to psychology. Still need 30 credit hours to finish.
